text: Don't forget #flu during #COVID19. CDC says flu kills up to 61K in US and up to 646K globally each year. 1918 pandemic infected 1/3 of world and killed up to 50M. Now we have a #vaccine. No need to gargle. Flee the flu. Get your shot while waiting on #CovidVaccine. #immunizeUSA https://t.co/SCVZOdLFQh
